QueryViewSpec.Name: Active Sponsorships With No Payments Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Used to fix missing installments on active sponsorships that have no payments applied
QueryViewSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL:
select distinct SPONSORSHIP.ID, sponsor.LOOKUPID SPONSORLOOKUPID, so.LOOKUPID CHILDLOOKUPID, so_child.NAME CHILDNAME, BATCH.BATCHNUMBER, SPONSORSHIP.STARTDATE from SPONSORSHIP join CONSTITUENT sponsor on sponsor.ID = SPONSORSHIP.CONSTITUENTID join SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on so_child.ID = SPONSORSHIP.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID join SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so on so.ID = SPONSORSHIP.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID left join dbo.BATCHREVENUE br on br.CONSTITUENTID = SPONSORSHIP.CONSTITUENTID join dbo.BATCH on br.BATCHID = BATCH.ID
where SPONSORSHIP.STATUSCODE = 1 and dbo.USR_UFN_SPONSORSHIP_HASPAYMENT (SPONSORSHIP.ID, '1/1/2000') = 0
